001package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
002
003import static imagingbook.common.color.cie.StandardIlluminant.D50;
004import static imagingbook.common.color.cie.StandardIlluminant.D65;
005
006import imagingbook.common.color.adapt.BradfordAdaptation;
007import imagingbook.common.color.adapt.ChromaticAdaptation;
008
009/**
010 * This interface specifies methods {@link #toCIEXYZ65(float[])} and
011 * {@link #fromCIEXYZ65(float[])} for direct conversion between the color
012 * space's native color values and D65 XYZ-coordinates. This is useful for color
013 * spaces that are D65-based by avoiding additional conversions to and from
014 * D50-based PCS.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 * @version 2022/11/15
018 */
019public interface DirectD65Conversion {
020        
021        static final ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D65, D50);
022        static final ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D50, D65);
023        
024        // methods required by all implementations of ColorSpace:
025        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] value);
026        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] value);
027        public float[] toRGB(float[] value);
028        public float[] fromRGB(float[] value);
029        
030        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
031        
032        /**
033         * Analogous to {@link #fromCIEXYZ(float[])} but accepts D65-based instead of
034         * D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this
035         * method to avoid the additional D65 to D50 conversion.
036         * 
037         * @param xyz65 D65-based XYZ color values
038         * @return color values in this color space
039         */
040        public default float[] fromCIEXYZ65(float[] xyz65) {
041                float[] XYZ50 = catD65toD50.applyTo(xyz65);
042                return this.fromCIEXYZ(XYZ50);
043        }
044        
045        /**
046         * Analogous to {@link #toCIEXYZ(float[])} but returns D65-based instead of
047         * D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this
048         * method to avoid the additional D50 to D65 conversion.
049         * 
050         * @param value color value in this color space
051         * @return D65-based XYZ color values
052         */
053        public default float[] toCIEXYZ65(float[] value) {
054                float[] XYZ50 = this.toCIEXYZ(value);
055                return catD50toD65.applyTo(XYZ50);
056        }
057        
058}
